title: 1.12如何检测某个实体被攻击并且触发指令
author: LuckyGOGO
txt_content: 1.12如何检测某个实体被攻击并且触发指令

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
给某个实体一个标签

/scoreboard players tag @e[c=5] add a

然后高频，依次执行
/scoreboard players tag @e[tag=a] add b {Health:20.0f}
/execute @e[tag!=b] ~ ~ ~ say 被攻击了
scoreboard players tag @e[tag=b] remove b

replies.author: 天佑酱
replies.txt_content:
如果想慢一点但是稳一点可以:（高频执行）
scoreboard players tag @e add SMFX070 {HurtTime:1s}
execute @e[tag=SMFX070] ~ ~ ~ xxx
scoreboard players tag @e[tag=SMFX070] remove SMFX070
